level.text: Except as otherwise provided in this title, permissible means of delivery of a record include delivery by hand, mail by the United States Postal Service, commercial delivery service, and electronic transmission.
Delivery to the Mayor shall be effective only when the record is received by the Mayor.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Former ยง 29-101.04 has been recodified as ยง 29A-101.04.
